item.title: Using Telegram Bot for Announcing Our Progress Python Computing
item.description: Telegram Bot for Python Redirecting my post in LinkedIn (Click Here), I want to retype it to my GitHub blog. I want to share a free simple script for helping us to announce what is our python program doing in our telegram group chat. It’s only changing ‘YOUR TOKEN’ and ‘YOUR CHAT ID’ in the script. Finally, yup, all including functions can be used by inputting these in our own programs/scripts.
